name: Datetime

methods.name: addDays
methods.description: Adds the specified number of days to a Datetime.

methods.name: addHours
methods.description: Adds the specified number of hours to a Datetime.

methods.name: addMinutes
methods.description: Adds the specified number of minutes to a Datetime.

methods.name: addMonths
methods.description: Adds the specified number of months to a Datetime.

methods.name: addSeconds
methods.description: Adds the specified number of seconds to a Datetime.

methods.name: addYears
methods.description: Adds the specified number of years to a Datetime.

methods.name: date
methods.description: Returns the Date component of a Datetime in the local time zone of the context user.

methods.name: dateGMT
methods.description: Return the Date component of a Datetime in the GMT time zone.

methods.name: day
methods.description: Returns the day-of-month component of a Datetime in the local time zone of the context user.

methods.name: dayGmt
methods.description: Returns the day-of-month component of a Datetime in the GMT time zone.

methods.name: dayOfYear
methods.description: Returns the day-of-year component of a Datetime in the local time zone of the context user.

methods.name: dayOfYearGmt
methods.description: Returns the day-of-year component of a Datetime in the GMT time zone.

methods.name: format
methods.description: Converts the date to the local time zone and returns the converted date as a formatted string using the locale of the context user. If the time zone cannot be determined, GMT is used.

methods.name: format
methods.description: Converts the date to the local time zone and returns the converted date as a string using the supplied Java simple date format. If the time zone cannot be determined, GMT is used.

methods.name: format
methods.signature: public String format(String dateFormatString, String timezone)
methods.description: Converts the date to the specified time zone and returns the converted date as a string using the supplied Java simple date format. If the supplied time zone is not in the correct format, GMT is used.

methods.name: formatGmt
methods.description: Returns a Datetime as a string using the supplied Java simple date format and the GMT time zone.

methods.name: formatLong
methods.description: Converts the date to the local time zone and returns the converted date in long date format.

methods.name: getTime
methods.description: Returns the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT represented by this DateTime object.

methods.name: hour
methods.description: Returns the hour component of a Datetime in the local time zone of the context user.

methods.name: hourGmt
methods.description: Returns the hour component of a Datetime in the GMT time zone.

methods.name: isSameDay
methods.description: Returns true if the Datetime that called the method is the same as the specified Datetime in the local time zone of the context user.

methods.name: millisecond
methods.description: Return the millisecond component of a Datetime in the local time zone of the context user.

methods.name: millisecondGmt
methods.description: Return the millisecond component of a Datetime in the GMT time zone.

methods.name: minute
methods.description: Returns the minute component of a Datetime in the local time zone of the context user.

methods.name: minuteGmt
methods.description: Returns the minute component of a Datetime in the GMT time zone.

methods.name: month
methods.description: Returns the month component of a Datetime in the local time zone of the context user (1=Jan).

methods.name: monthGmt
methods.description: Returns the month component of a Datetime in the GMT time zone (1=Jan).

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Constructs a Datetime and initializes it to represent the specified number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.signature: public static Datetime newInstance(Date date, Time time)
methods.description: Constructs a DateTime from the specified date and time in the local time zone.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.signature: public static Datetime newInstance(Integer year, Integer month, Integer day)
methods.description: Constructs a Datetime from Integer representations of the specified year, month (1=Jan), and day at midnight in the local time zone.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.signature: public static Datetime newInstance(Integer year, Integer month, Integer day, Integer hour, Integer minute, Integer second)
methods.description: Constructs a Datetime from Integer representations of the specified year, month (1=Jan), day, hour, minute, and second in the local time zone.

methods.name: newInstanceGmt
methods.signature: public static Datetime newInstanceGmt(Date date, Time time)
methods.description: Constructs a DateTime from the specified date and time in the GMT time zone.

methods.name: newInstanceGmt
methods.signature: public static Datetime newInstanceGmt(Integer year, Integer month, Integer date)
methods.description: Constructs a Datetime from Integer representations of the specified year, month (1=Jan), and day at midnight in the GMT time zone

methods.name: newInstanceGmt
methods.signature: public static Datetime newInstanceGmt(Integer year, Integer month, Integer date, Integer hour, Integer minute, Integer second)
methods.description: Constructs a Datetime from Integer representations of the specified year, month (1=Jan), day, hour, minute, and second in the GMT time zone

methods.name: now
methods.description: Returns the current Datetime based on a GMT calendar.

methods.name: parse
methods.description: Constructs a Datetime from the given String in the local time zone and in the format of the user locale.

methods.name: second
methods.description: Returns the second component of a Datetime in the local time zone of the context user.

methods.name: secondGmt
methods.description: Returns the second component of a Datetime in the GMT time zone.

methods.name: time
methods.description: Returns the time component of a Datetime in the local time zone of the context user.

methods.name: timeGmt
methods.description: Returns the time component of a Datetime in the GMT time zone.

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Returns a Datetime that contains the value of the specified string.

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Converts the specified object to a Datetime. Use this method to convert a history tracking field value or an object that represents a Datetime value.

methods.name: valueOfGmt
methods.description: Returns a Datetime that contains the value of the specified String.

methods.name: year
methods.description: Returns the year component of a Datetime in the local time zone of the context user.

methods.name: yearGmt
methods.description: Returns the year component of a Datetime in the GMT time zone.

description: Contains methods for the Datetime primitive data type.
